WorkflowInfo.Name: Create Volume with multiple LUNs
WorkflowInfo.Description: Create a volume with the requested number of LUNs. Volume size will be determined by the sum of all LUNs' sizes.
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow creates a volume with the requested number of LUNs. The volume size will be determined by the sum of all LUNs' sizes. This workflow should be triggered by a Self Service request.

Requirements:
* NetApp module is configured and Up.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the Self Service request):
* NetApp Cluster
* Vserver
* Aggregate
* Volume
* OS Type
* LUN Size
* Number of LUNs
* LUN Prefix

Output
A report table containing the paths to the new LUNs.
WorkflowInfo.XML:

xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FunctionCalculator x:Name="volumeSize" IsValid="True" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Calculate a function" TypeName="FunctionCalculator" Formula="%numLuns% * %sizeLun% * 1.15" DisplayName="Function Calculator" /><ns1:NetAppCreateBasicVolume TypeName="NetAppCreateBasicVolume" HostId="-2" SelectedModuleType="23" HostName="%NetAppCluster%" SelectedModuleID="9" Timeout="00:01:00" Password="" x:Name="netAppCreateBasicVolume1" DisplayName="NetApp Create Basic Volume" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedModuleName="NetApp" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Create a new volume with basic settings" IsValid="True" SizeMb="%volumeSize%" Vserver="%vserver%" Aggregate="%aggregate%" ExportPolicy="default" Username="" VolumeType="rw" VolumeName="%volume%" /><ns2:CreateMemoryTable x:Name="LunsCreated" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">

 </xs:complexType>

</NewDataSet>" RowNumber="1" isEmptyGrid="0" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="luns" Description="Creates a memory table." TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Create Memory Table" IsValid="True" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns4:ExitWhile x:Name="exitWhile1" IsValid="True" Counter="%numLuns%" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Exit current while activity" TypeName="ExitWhile" DisplayName="Exit While" /><ns5:GetRowsCount x:Name="lunIndex" IsValid="True" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" ResultSetName="luns" ResultSet="%luns%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" /><ns6:NetAppCreateLun TypeName="NetAppCreateLun" HostId="-2" SelectedModuleType="23" HostName="%NetAppCluster%" SelectedModuleID="9" Username="" Password="" LunPath="/vol/%volume%/%lunPrefix%%lunIndex%" DisplayName="NetApp Create Lun" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedModuleName="NetApp" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Create Lun" SpaceReserved="true" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" Vserver="%vserver%" SizeMb="%sizeLun%" x:Name="netAppCreateLun1" OsType="%osType%" /><ns7:SetCellValue x:Name="saveNewLunInfo" NewValue="/vol/%volume%/%lunPrefix%%lunIndex%" IsValid="True" RowNumber="%lunIndex%" VariableName="%luns%" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Set a new value to a result set."
